article.title: Thales Raytheon to Support Sentinel Radar
article.author: George I. Seffers
article.text: Thales Raytheon Systems Co., Fullerton, Calif., was awarded a $14,349,670 fixed-price incentive contract for the services in support of the Sentinel radar. The U.S. Army Contracting Command, Redstone Arsenal, Ala., is the contracting activity.
